title: Actually a Bit Sad?
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Alright, that’s a wrap~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Phew.... That was quite a harsh practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You say that, but you don’t look like you had a hard time at all~. You have a lot of stamina, don’t you, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I wonder. Isn’t it just average?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>No no no, our first years always complain about this one~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Ah, so that’s what it is. You feel a little bit sad that you didn’t get to hear me say, “It’s too hard, Kanan~,” right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eeeeh!? No, not at all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You have a soft spot for people that like to be spoiled, huh? Then I guess I’ll indulge you. I’d love to drink some cold juice after practice.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’m telling you, it’s not like that~. But, I guess a bottle of juice is only fair for a girl who did her best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Fufu, I like that about you, Kanan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
